avaritia:container.infinity_chest.title: Infinity Chest
tooltip.avaritia.crystal_matrix_ingot.de: This isn't even its final form.
tooltip.avaritia.neutron_pile.desc: Try not to think about it.
tooltip.avaritia.neutronium_ingot.desc: The dense heart of a star in convenient ingot form.
tooltip.avaritia.infinity_catalyst.desc: One is all and all is one.
tooltip.avaritia.infinity_ingot.desc: The fury of the universe in the palm of your hand.
tooltip.avaritia.record_fragment.desc: One likes to believe in the freedom of music~
tooltip.avaritia.skullfire_sword.desc: Beheads skeletons and scorches them black.
tooltip.avaritia.infinity_singularity.de: A creation that fuses countless singularities.
tooltip.avaritia.infinity_chest.desc: It is said to be able to hold the whole world.
advancements.avaritia.root.title: Avaritia
advancements.avaritia.diamond_lattice.de: Diamonds are processed into a diamond lattice
advancements.avaritia.crystal_matrix_ing: Diamond lattices are processed into a crystal matrix ingot
advancements.avaritia.compressed_craftin: Nine crafting tables were processed into a compressed crafting table
advancements.avaritia.extreme_crafting_t: Nine compressed crafting tables were processed into a extreme crafting table
advancements.avaritia.compressor.title: Deadly compressors
advancements.avaritia.compressor.descrip: Use the extreme crafting table to craft a neutronium compressor
advancements.avaritia.singularity.title: Appeared! Event Horizon!
advancements.avaritia.singularity.descri: The singularity is compressed using a neutronium compressor
advancements.avaritia.infinity_singulari: Checks and balances from the Cosmos!
Use the extreme crafting table to craft a infinity singularity
Craft a neutron collector and use the chunk loader to on-hook!
advancements.avaritia.neutron_pile.title: Insignificant......
advancements.avaritia.neutron_pile.descr: Use a neutron collector to collect neutron pile from the air
advancements.avaritia.infinity_chest.des: Use the extreme crafting table to craft a infinity chest and use it to store items!
Use the extreme crafting table to craft a infinity catalyst
advancements.avaritia.infinity_ingot.tit: Stand at a new starting point!
advancements.avaritia.infinity_ingot.des: Use the extreme crafting table to craft a infinity ingot
advancements.avaritia.infinity_sword.tit: With the power of the Cosmos, dominate the Cosmos!
advancements.avaritia.infinity_sword.des: Blade the sword of the Cosmos
advancements.avaritia.skullfire_sword.de: Have a Wither skeleton blade the skullfire sword
advancements.avaritia.infinity_bow.title: Under the blow of God, all beings are equal!
advancements.avaritia.infinity_bow.descr: Use the longbow of the heavens and watch the falling arrow rain!
advancements.avaritia.infinity_armor.des: Equip a full set of infinity armor and then experience the feeling of infinity protection!
advancements.avaritia.endest_pearl.title: Black hole......Appeared
advancements.avaritia.endest_pearl.descr: Use the endest pearl to summon a black hole
